GuardrailRule.description: A single guardrail validation rule applied to swarm output.

action.description: Action on violation: warn (emit event, continue) or halt (fail run, stop chaining)
action.title: Action

pattern.description: Regex pattern (required for regex_match and regex_reject types)
pattern.title: Pattern

threshold.description: Numeric threshold (required for min_lines and max_errors types)
threshold.title: Threshold

type.description: Rule type: regex_match (require pattern), regex_reject (reject pattern), min_lines (minimum output lines), max_errors (max error count)
type.title: Type

ProjectConfig.description: Project agent configuration: control swarm behavior.

auto_stop_minutes.description: Auto-stop swarm if no output for N minutes (0 = disabled)
auto_stop_minutes.title: Auto Stop Minutes

circuit_breaker_max_failures.description: Max failures within window before circuit opens (1-10, None = disabled)
circuit_breaker_max_failures.title: Circuit Breaker Max Failures

circuit_breaker_recovery_seconds.description: Wait time before half-open probe attempt (30-600, None = 60)
circuit_breaker_recovery_seconds.title: Circuit Breaker Recovery Seconds

circuit_breaker_window_seconds.description: Failure counting window in seconds (60-3600, None = 300)
circuit_breaker_window_seconds.title: Circuit Breaker Window Seconds

guardrails.description: Output guardrail rules validated when all agents exit (None = disabled)
guardrails.title: Guardrails

max_duration_hours.description: Max swarm duration in hours (0.5-48, None = unlimited)
max_duration_hours.title: Max Duration Hours

max_restarts_per_agent.description: Max restarts per agent (0-10, None = unlimited)
max_restarts_per_agent.title: Max Restarts Per Agent

ProjectConfig.title: ProjectConfig

examples: Build a task management dashboard with React + FastAPI
goal.title: Goal

examples: Must include authentication and real-time updates
